The expert offered results from a quantitative analysis of hashtags and from dates that the #AmberHeard‚Äôs legal team thought were pertinent. The expert claimed that by analyzing 0.1% of the tweets he could determine that 100% of the tweets had a negative bias towards Amber Heard.
Social media analysis is an interdisciplinary field that incorporates IT knowledge, rhetoric, sociology, and many other social sciences. The purpose of this testimony was to support #AmberHeard‚Äôs claim of reputational damage. It failed. Miserably.
